column4: hey everyone I have a SIL3132 eSATA card in my ubuntu box.  The card works except FIS switching does not.  Does anyone have any ideas what I can do?
does anyone have a suggestion of a PCIe USB 3.0 card that will work with ubuntu?
yes truecrypt is the only full disk encryption the feds can't crack
truecrypt is a software, not a encryption. You're probably thinking about AES
